turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to file an insurance claim. I had a car accident last week.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the accident. I can help you with that. To get started, could you please provide your policy number and a brief description of what happened?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, the policy number is ABC123XYZ. The other driver ran a red light and hit me. I have pictures of the damage and the police report.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. Please upload the pictures and the police report to our secure portal. You can find the link at [link]. Also, what is the other driver's insurance information? I'll need that to determine liability and process your claim efficiently. By the way, are you looking to file a claim for property damage or bodily injury?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I'm not sure. I have some minor injuries, but I don't know if I need to see a doctor yet. Also, how long is this going to take? My car is undrivable, and I need to get this resolved ASAP!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I understand your frustration. For bodily injury, it's generally best to seek medical attention and then report the injury claim within the guidelines of your policy. The processing time for property damage claims is usually around 1-2 weeks, but it can vary based on the complexity of the case and the other insurance company's cooperation. We'll expedite your claim as much as possible. We'll contact the other driver's insurance to determine liability. Can you provide the other driver's insurance information? Also, you will need to get an estimate for the car repair which we can help you with.
